availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Francis Marion Garner (Ballard County, Kentucky, farm hand)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farm hand. Kentucky native. Son of John Garner and Malinda Garner. Married to Mary Latishia Hobaman Garner. Father of Mary Garner and Hiram B. Garner. Resident in Ballard County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farm hand in Ballard County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, p. 298A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Blandville, p. 577.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, District 3, p. 395A.
